title: League of Legends Cinematic: A New Dawn

replies.body: Up vote this is you want Riot to make a movie!

A movie would be great, but i feel like if they make a series of movies it would either take too long and it would come to an end. If they make cinematics, i feel like it could go on forever, and the fact that they are not that long makes it more suspenseful.
League of legends anime, anyone?
This was awesome! There totally needs to be a movie!
My favorite part was how {{champion:119}} died.. best death NA
I like how {{champion:89}} dies..... oh wait she didn't, because she is a fking beast!
lol right
What about that {{champion:111}} appearance! Was not expecting that.
I liked how  Katarina dies. XD
{{champion:103}} Just goes over the branch. (In the beginning) {{champion:89}} Just makes the branch her bitch and plows right through it...

{{champion:55}} sexy slide

{{champion:103}} nimble leap

{{champion:89}} MOVE BITCH
{{champion:119}} wtf noobs no peels gg. {{champion:107}} /all haha ez kill noob {{champion:111}} sorry im late guys wraiths was more important then team fighting.
Any one else wondering why Ahri was being absolutely useless until the end?
Ult was on cooldown she didn't get {{item:3128}} early
1st time Ahri
She wasn't... she dealt with Zyra, too. How much does one character need to do?
When Leona blasted Darius near the end, I was all like, THE DAWN HAS ARRIVED MOTHAFAKA {{champion:89}}
Moral of the story ward the jungle =)
Looks like Nautilus got buffed.

That was seriously so much better than I expected.
10/10 - Would watch again.
Already have watched it again! xD
5 v 5 in the jungle, baited by Katarina, Nautilus shows up to the fight late, what is this Bronze?
{{champion:111}} Sometimes this anchor just weighs me down.....la da de....... do da.
Draven was completly useless. If they were going to make him useless, atleast give him some highlights.
I was honestly expecting Ahri to charm Draven and Darius, Darius falls for it, and Draven just pulls out a mirror to look at himself or something.
This is a teaser of the new Graves ult. {{champion:104}} will just blow up, commiting suicide, and bring down a giant flipping wall on the enemy.
fucking riot pls. make a movie.
i hated the part when it ends, i wish it never ends
Was personally hoping for Diana vs Leona and Kha'Zix vs Rengar.

{{champion:122}} > {{champion:103}} + {{champion:107}} + {{champion:89}} 

Witness true strength.
to bad he used his ult on {{champion:89}}  or he would of had it for that fight
And {{champion:122}} didn't get the kill on {{champion:89}} so no reset.
First time {{champion:122}}.
Anyone else think Rengar looks cute? anyone? just me? I want one.
Its unbelievable how great the animations are throughout the whole video. Naut was def. a badass, aswell as Rengar.
Dude yall should make like a Series or movie .... or even T.V show even people that dont play league would watch it i swear yall would be doing this world a favour bring this series OUT NOW
Support carry. {{champion:89}}
Way to step up your game Riot, and make a new standard for video game cinematics. I enjoyed it very much. Thank you for the time and effort.

Why does Demacia always win.

Can Noxus win once?
{{champion:103}}  must have been out of mana the whole time until the end...
is jax holding a feral flare..
{{champion:89}} Saves the Day, and not one Wallpaper of her. I am not happy Riot. Not happy at all.

I lost it when Leona charged through the tree.
{{champion:89}} "Hmmm....let's see...Oh hey we have a nice couple of ways around the tree branch...BETTER CHARGE STRAIGHT THROUGH IT."
i have the strangest boner right now{{champion:103}} {{champion:89}}

not gonna lie, teared up a ~~little~~ a lot when leona died 
and also, huge lady boner for rengar- rawr, little kitty (and also a slightly smaller one for kat, like daang did you see them leg splits?)
{{champion:104}} his face at 3:20 lol
So that bit with Zyra and Ahri... I've got some suggestions for the next cinematic.
I wanna see Lucian and Nasus, their voices are just too cool.
Since this is an international game, probably didn't go with voices because of different languages.
